Description: St Antony; the saint standing in the centre, holding a book; at his feet to the left a pig. c. 1490-1500 Engraving Watermark: none
Curator's comments: Cf. Alan Shestack, Fifteenth Century Engravings of Northern Europe, exh. cat., National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C. 1968, no. 127.
Bibliographic references: Lehrs 1908-34 / Geschichte und kritische Katalog des deutschen, niederländischen und französischen Kupferstichs im XV Jahrhundert (VII.145.39)
Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (39)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition notes: The register records that the print was in a sale at Christie's in July 1873
